articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory successfully remodeled as required by the age of knowledge-based economy and befitting a highly civilized socialist nation.
					 He went round the newly-built room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the factory.
					
					 Watching the data showing the glorious path of development covered by the factory, he said that it turned into a large-scale food-processing base thanks to the leadership and care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. The factory should always remember the noble loving care they had shown for the people for improving the standard of their living all their lives, he added. 
					
					 Recollecting the day when he visited the factory together with Kim Jong Il, he said that it arranged well the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to its history so that it might convey to posterity the profound loving care shown by the great leaders for the supply of confectionary to the people. 
					
					 Visiting the room for the education in the revolutionary history alone one may know well about the exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by dedicating themselves to the people and the WPK's policy of developing the food industry, he noted that a lot of historical materials displayed in the room serve as a banner putting spurs to the development of the food industry in the new century and dynamically encouraging its workers in their drive to increase the production.
					
					 Going round various places of the factory, he learned in detail about its modernization and production.
					
					 He said that the factory put all production processes including corn-processing process, millet jelly production process, Oktang sugar production process, cake production process and candy production process on an automated, streamlined, germ- and dust-free basis on a high level and established a strict system for test of quality, thus making it possible to rapidly boost productivity with less manpower and thoroughly ensure the hygienic safety of the products.
					
					 Saying that the biggest success registered by the factory in its modernization is that the proportion of locally produced equipment has reached more than 95 percent, he noted that cutting-edge equipment designed and manufactured by the DPRK are running in all production processes from the raw material feeding to packing of products and all of them look nice. The field of food industry has taken the lead in implementing the party's line of locally producing equipment in recent years, he added.
					
					 The factory has turned into the one to be proud of against the backdrop of a high-pitched drive for updating production facilities in our own way with local production of equipment as the core sweeping the whole country, he pointed out, pleased that this factory is the one holding high the banner of Juche-orientation, the one worthy of being a model in creating the spirit of self-reliance and self-development and the one teaching how to carry out modernization.
					
					 He had a photo session with the officials and employees of the factory.
					
					 Accompanying him were Department Director An Jong Su and vice department directors Jo Yong Won and Sin Man Gyun of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: FM Spokesman of DPRK Assails Entry of U.S. Nuclear Submarine to S. Korea
articles.content:
FM Spokesman of DPRK Assails Entry of U.S. Nuclear Submarine to S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- On June 13 the U.S. nuclear submarine Mississippi entered Pusan Port, south Korea, its first appearance in Asia-Pacific.
					 The sub which was put into commission in 2012 is an up-to-date attack nuclear submarine of the U.S. Navy with the mission of attack and special operations, being equipped with lots of torpedo and cruise missile launching devices.
					
					 During the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises which it staged in south Korea for over 50 days since March, the U.S. mobilized Stennis nuclear carrier, B-52 and B-2 nuclear strategic bombers, F-22A stealth fighters and other huge strategic nuclear attack means, creating a touch-and-go situation.
					
					 A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK in a statement on Thursday said:
					
					 Two U.S. nuclear subs are constantly cruising in waters in Asia-Pacific around the Korean peninsula and "precision air raid operation" against the nuclear facilities and nuclear force of the DPRK is in the process of open preparation in the U.S. The entry of Mississippi to south Korea against this backdrop is a direct threat to the security of the DPRK and peace of the region.
					
					 The U.S. ceaseless introduction of strategic assets of various kinds to and around the Korean peninsula is rendering the already unstable situation all the more uncontrollable.
					
					 The best way of averting a war and ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula, the world's biggest hotspot where there is constant danger of a nuclear war due to the U.S. ceaseless provocations for a new war, is to bolster the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence in every way.
					
					 The line of the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force is the most just line for fundamentally removing the danger of a nuclear war created by the U.S. and ensuring peace and security in the region and the rest of the world by dint of the powerful nuclear deterrence.
					
					 It is sophism for the U.S. to trumpet about making denuclearization a priority while persistently resorting to nuclear blackmail and nuclear war exercises against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. has to make a policy decision to roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and withdraw its aggression troops and war means from south Korea, clearly understanding the strategic position of the DPRK that has ranked itself among the nuclear powers and facing up to the trend of the times.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets ITF Leading Members
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets ITF Leading Members
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with President Ri Yong Son, Vice-President Leong Wai Meng and other leading members of the International Taekwon-Do Federation who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets New Mongolian, Zambian Ambassadors
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets New Mongolian, Zambian Ambassadors
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho met and had talks respectively with new Mongolian Ambassador to the DPRK Suren Tsoggerel and new Zambian ambassador to the DPRK Winnie Natala Chibesakunda who paid courtesy calls on him on June 15 and 16.

articles.title: New DPRK Ambassador to South Africa Appointed
articles.content:
New DPRK Ambassador to South Africa Appointed
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Chang Ryop was appointed as DPRK ambassador to South Africa according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: Presidium of SPA Ratifies UN Convention against Transnational Organized Crime
articles.content:
Presidium of SPA Ratifies UN Convention against Transnational Organized Crime
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK ratified the United Nations Convention against Transnational Organized Crime on June 16, Juche 105 (2016).
					 The convention was adopted at the UN General Assembly on November 15, 2000. It stipulates rights and duties to be abided by signatories for strengthening international cooperation in preventing transnational organized crimes including money laundering, terrorism and illicit trafficking of narcotic drugs.
					
					 The document of accession will soon be presented to the secretary general of the United Nations, trustee of the convention.

articles.title: 16th Meeting of Steering Committee of COSCAP of NA of ICAO Held
articles.content:
16th Meeting of Steering Committee of COSCAP of NA of ICAO Held
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The 16th Meeting of the Steering Committee of the Cooperative Development of Operational Safety and Continuing Airworthiness Programme (COSCAP) of North Asia of the International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) was held here on June 15 and 16.
					 Present there were Kang Ki Sop, general director of the General Bureau of Civil Aviation of the DPRK, and officials concerned, Jin Yibin, executive chairman of the 16th Steering Committee of the COSCAP of North Asia of the ICAO, Michiel Vreedenburgh, chief of the Implementation Planning and Support Section (Safety) of the Air Navigation Bureau of the ICAO, Wayne Chapin, chief technical adviser of the COSCAP of North Asia of the ICAO, a delegation of the Civil Aviation Authority of Mongolia led by Deputy Director General Batchuluun Daadankhuu, members of a delegation of the Civil Aviation Administration of China led by Xin Tianhe, Javier Vicedo, representative of the European Aviation Safety Agency in Beijing, and other foreign guests.
					
					 Kang Ki Sop said that the civil aviation is greeting a new heyday in its development in the DPRK under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, adding that his bureau would further boost the country's civil aviation.
					
					 Jin Yibin said that the meeting provided the member countries of the north Asian region with an opportunity to exchange successes and experience gained in the work to prevent the flight accident by shaping the plan for the state's safety and establishing the safety management system.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the activities of the 2015-2016 cooperative development program and discussed and decided the technical issues arising in sincerely fulfilling the responsibility and duty of boosting the regional cooperation among member countries and observing the standard requirements of the ICAO including 2016-2017 flight operation and aviation serviceability.

articles.title: IMGC Executive Board Meets
articles.content:
IMGC Executive Committee Meets
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Executive Committee of the International Martial Arts Games Committee (IMGC) took place in Pyongyang on Thursday.
					 It was attended by Chairman of the IMGC Ri Yong Son, president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF), Vice-Chairman of the IMGC Leong Wai Meng, vice-president of the ITF, and other members of the Executive Committee of the IMGC.
					
					 Representatives from the International Martial Arts Federation and the national martial arts games committees attended it as observers.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issues of further developing the work of the IMGC to realize its ideal and of setting the host place for the 7th International Martial Arts Games.

articles.title: Staff Members of Polish Embassy Help DPRK Farmers
articles.content:
Staff Members of Polish Embassy Help DPRK Farmers
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Polish Ambassador to the DPRK Krzysztof Ciebien and his embassy officials did friendship labor at the DPRK-Poland Friendship Jangsuwon Co-op Farm Thursday.
					 Being briefed on the leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the farm, they looked round the room dedicated to the history of the farm.
					
					 They helped the farmers in rice-transplanting.

articles.title: Delegation of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Back Home
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League headed by Jong Yong Won, secretary of its Central Committee, returned home on Thursday after taking part in the first international preparatory meeting for the 19th World Festival of Youth and Students held in Venezuela.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Railways Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Railways Back Home
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Railways led by Minister Jang Hyok came back home Thursday after taking part in the 44th ministerial meeting of the Organization of Railways Cooperation held in Baku, Azerbaijan.

articles.title: DPRK Workers, Members of GFTUK Meet
articles.content:
DPRK Workers, Members of GFTUK Meet
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) for poem reciting and singing "We'll Travel One Road Forever, Following Party"    took place at the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex on Thursday on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Through chorus "Ode to Comrade Kim Jong Il", epic "People Sing of June" and other numbers the performers showed that an epoch-making change was brought about in developing the WPK and in accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution and that a sacred history of the WPK was given a steady continuity true to the tradition of the "Down-with-Imperialism Union" as the WPK was led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They represented through serial songs "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un" and other numbers the joy of the people who elected supreme leader Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK and the faith and will of the workers and members of the GFTUK who are performing fresh miracles and feats in the 200-day campaign of loyalty.

articles.title: Preparations for Wonsan Air Festival-2016 Goes on in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for Wonsan Air Festival-2016 Goes on in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Preparations for the Wonsan Air Festival-2016 to be held in September are getting brisk in the DPRK.
					 The preparatory committee of the festival, involving experts at home and abroad, was organized some days ago.
					
					 According to Ri Sing Ryol, vice-chairman of the preparatory committee, warplanes and passenger planes were chosen for successful aeronautic demonstration and air trip.
					
					 Preparations for diverse sports and cultural events are on steady progress as scheduled. They include art performance, evening gala of youth and students, demonstration by members of the Pyongyang Air Club and DPRK-made beer fair.
					
					 Kalma Airport and Haean Square and other parts of Wonsan City are furnished with decorations and lighting appliances. And posters with the theme of the festival are being created.
					
					 The festival, the first of its kind in the DPRK, draws worldwide attention. Well-known foreign air sportspersons and fans expressed their willingness to take part in the festival.

articles.title: Vertical Oxygen-Blast Furnace Built in DPRK
articles.content:
Vertical Oxygen-Blast Furnace Built in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Sunchon Chemical Complex in the DPRK has recently built a vertical oxygen-blast furnace with indigenous technology to produce pig iron without using cokes.
					 This furnace makes it possible to use natural ironstone and anthracite and even various kinds of low-grade iron ore as raw materials.
					
					 Its smelting-reduction process was proved through full operation to be a highly-efficient iron-making process that can mass-produce pig iron with 100 percent domestic raw materials and fuel.
					
					 The Ferrous Metal Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences and the complex jointly set up a combined automatic control system for the Juche-based iron-making process.
					
					 They also developed a new technology for collecting and using waste gas from the furnace and modernized its dust-collection system.

articles.title: Ecological Water Purification Technology Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Ecological Water Purification Technology Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Researchers of the Life Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK developed a technology of purifying water through artificial floating garden and introduced it to the Pothong River in central Pyongyang, the capital city of the country.
					 According to a researcher Man Ho Song, the floating flower garden on the river is based on one of the advanced water purification technologies and it is good not only for water purification but also for sightseeing.
					
					 He said:
					
					 We confirmed through an experiment that the float cultivation method could be applied to the production of rice.
					
					 On this basis we conducted experiments with flowering plants and selected more than 10 species of them that would take roots in the river to purify water while having an ornamental effect.
					
					 The area of floating flower garden is about 600 square meters, and the results of its experiment in a closed interval showed that the degree of water purification was 90 percent.
					
					 Accordingly, it is possible to purify at least 95 percent of the river when such floating flower gardens are displayed in 25-30 percent of its water surface area.

articles.title: National Industrial Art Exhibition Goes on in DPRK
articles.content:
National Industrial Art Exhibition Goes on in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A national industrial art exhibition for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, is now going on at the State Industrial Art Exhibition Hall here.
					 On display at the exhibition are over 170 designs personally examined by supreme leader Kim Jong Un and more than 1 200 designs presented by creators, researchers, teachers and students of ministries, national institutions and industrial art field.
					
					 Present on the first floor of the exhibition are designs of industrial goods, architecture and environmental ornaments, furniture, building fixtures, natural museum, movable framed net fish-breeding ground and school bags and shoes. The designs exhibited on the second floor include those of trademarks, package, school things, cosmetics, advertisements and garments as well as trial products.

articles.title: New National Record Set in Archery
articles.content:
New National Record Set in Archery
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- An eight day-long archery game of the Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize came to a close in the DPRK on June 14.
					 The Amnokgang Defence Sports Team clinched four gold medals out of five in the event.
					
					 Kang Un Ju from the Defense Sports Team of the Korean People's Army renewed the national record in the women's individual 70-meter 72 arrows. The former record was set nine years ago.
					
					 Kang was qualified for the 31st Olympic Games in November last year.

articles.title: Appeal of DPRK Government, Political Parties, Organizations Supported by Chongryon Vice-Chairman
articles.content:
Appeal of DPRK Government, Political Parties, Organizations Supported by Chongryon Vice-Chairman
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Resident in Japan (Chongryon), issued a statement on June 15 in support of the appeal made at the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan received with excitement and emotion the appeal to all Koreans which was adopted at the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations to thoroughly carry out the line and policies for national reunification set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Now is the time for all Koreans to turn out and go all out for a sacred patriotic struggle to bring earlier the day of reunification in response to the above-said appeal.
					
					 We will uphold the new line and policies for national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un, a peerlessly great man, as an immortal great programme for national reunification and take the lead in arousing all overseas Koreans to the struggle to achieve the great national unity and the independent reunification of the country in hearty response to the appeal.
					
					 We will positively support the just struggle of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification and make a positive contribution to intensifying the movement of solidarity and alliance among the north and the south and overseas sides for realizing the reunification by federal formula by implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 We will resolutely join in the nationwide anti-U.S. struggle for putting an end to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and nuclear war exercises and driving the U.S. imperialist forces out of south Korea and thoroughly frustrate the Park Geun Hye group of traitors' country-selling politics, confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and foolish scenario for "unification of social systems".
					
					 We will make a tangible contribution to opening a new phase of improved north-south relations and independent reunification by sending a delegation of Koreans in Japan to the nationwide great meeting for reunification to be held to mark the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Dependence on Outsiders Is Act of Treachery: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Dependence on Outsiders Is Act of Treachery: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The present ruling forces of south Korea are a group of heinous traitors as they are doing harm to the destiny of the nation while being hell-bent on stifling the DPRK with the backing of outsiders, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 Terming the south Korean regime's dependence on outsiders and collusion with them an act of treachery against peace and reunification of the country, the dignity and interests of the nation, the article goes on:
					
					 The regime's dependence on outsiders is also a hideous challenge to the improvement of the north-south relations and the cause of reunification.
					
					 The U.S. is moving covertly and overtly to disarm the DPRK, being exasperated with its tremendous nuclear deterrent for self-defence getting stronger day by day.
					
					 But the south Korean authorities are recklessly following the U.S. policy to stifle the DPRK in disregard of the interests of the nation.
					
					 The south Korean confrontation maniacs' dependence on outsiders and collusion with them against the trend of times and the aspiration of all Koreans is chilling the hard-won atmosphere of the improvement of the north-south relations and creating serious obstacles to national reunification.
					
					 What can not be overlooked is that the south Korean authorities are tightening military nexus with the Japanese reactionaries at the U.S. beck and call.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are persisting in military provocations, pursuant to the policy of outsiders to stifle the DPRK by force. This has escalated tensions on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They should refrain from such shameful acts, bearing in mind that dependence on outsiders is an act of treachery doing harm to the destiny of the nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses S. Korean Foreign Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses S. Korean Foreign Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, south Korean minister of Foreign Affairs, in his recent public appearance before his foreign trip said that "north's denuclearization is a top priority" and "sanctions against the north have to last long." He went the lengths of crying out for continuing "sanctions" against the DPRK till they "prove efficacious" while describing them as an "powerful medicine."
					 During his foreign tour he spouted inveterate confrontation remarks.
					
					 Minju Joson Thursday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 He is an ill-famed confrontation maniac steeped in extreme hatred against the fellow countrymen to the marrow of his bones and a mentally deranged making desperate efforts to turn the international arena into a theater of inciting confrontation with the DPRK while persistently taking issue with its "human rights issue" and "nuclear and missile threat", pursuant to the policy of his American master.
					
					 His invectives are a vivid manifestation of the consciousness of defeat of the south Korean puppet group who now finds itself strategically inferior in face of the DPRK's boosting of nuclear force.
					
					 The puppet forces are now caught in extreme fear in face of the strong might of the DPRK capable of not only shattering the scheme they have sought with their American master to stifle it but also putting an end to their existence in no time.
					
					 They are talking volumes about the "north's dismantlement of nukes" without any measure and making solicitations to attain their sinister purpose, just like a drowning man catching at a straw.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and her group are making desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK and realize the daydream of "unification of social systems" at any cost by clinging to the coattails of outsiders.
					
					 Yun Pyong Se is playing a key role in the "diplomatic offensive."
					
					 It is a daydream for such betes noires as Yun to think about browbeating the DPRK with the above-said remarks and sordid solicitations.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Scuttling June 15 Joint National Event
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Scuttling June 15 Joint National Event
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- All Koreans at home and abroad are turning out as one in the pro-reunification patriotic movement to open up a new chapter of improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving the country's reunification with their concerted efforts on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					 This being a hard reality, the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea has made no scruple of committing the anti-reunification act of finally blocking the June 15 event common to the nation this year which has been promoted amid the great expectation and concern of all Koreans.
					
					 The Park group, taking umbrage at the meeting of the chairmen of the north side, south side and overseas side committees of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration from the outset, disallowed the delegates of the South Side Committee to take part in the meeting and imposed even fine on each of them, groundlessly incriminating their righteous act of taking part in the meeting with their bold decision.
					
					 The puppet group turned down the application made by the delegation of the south side committee to visit the north to participate in the June 15 event common to the nation to be held in Kaesong.
					
					 A spokesman for the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in a statement on June 16 branded the Park group's action to block the June 15 event common to the nation as a blatant challenge and treacherous and anti-reunification act of chilling the aspiration and desire of all Koreans for the improved inter-Korean relations, peace and reunification.
					
					 The spokesman went on;
					
					 The Park group's moves brought to light its sinister intention to justify its wicked scenario of pursuing sycophancy towards the U.S. and confrontation with the compatriots in the north, much upset by the Koreans' will for reunification. 
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove once again that the Park group is made up of the arch criminals who have pushed the inter-Korean relations into a catastrophe, deadset against the nation's reconciliation and unity, peace and reunification.
					
					 The Park group would be well advised to stop going reckless, bearing in mind that it can hardly evade the responsibility for having driven the inter-Korean relations to the lowest ebb and its persistent confrontational rackets would only precipitate its doom and a stern judgment by the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Call for Defusing Danger of Nuclear War through Conclusion of Peace Agreement
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Call for Defusing Danger of Nuclear War through Conclusion of Peace Agreement
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification held the 200th anti-U.S. meeting outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on June 14.
					 They expressed their will to carry on the dynamic struggle in demand of the revision of the unequal south Korea-U.S. "status of forces agreement" and the return of the territory occupied by the U.S. military base in Ryongsan.
					
					 The north's bolstering of its nuclear deterrent is to cope with the U.S hostile policy, they noted, adding that the denuclearization on the Korean peninsula is possible only when a peace agreement is concluded.
					
					 They stressed the need to defuse the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula through the conclusion of a peace agreement.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Covering Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Covering Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The April 16 Consultative Council of Families and the "People's Solidarity for Promise Made on April 16", south Korean organizations of bereaved families of the ferry Sewol disaster, held a news conference in Seoul on June 13 in protest against the puppet authorities trying to cover up the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 Speakers chided the "government" for pressurizing the Ad Hoc Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster to wind up its activities by using its power.
					
					 The behavior of the "government" is aimed at disregarding the will of the bereaved families and other people to see a thorough investigation into the disaster, they noted, and went on:
					
					 Chongwadae and gentries of the ruling party have hamstrung the Ad Hoc Committee's activities in an organized manner and worked hard to disband it.
					
					 They renewed the will to join the people in their actions to foil the above-said moves of the "government."

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting for national reunification took place at Rimjin Pavilion in Phaju, Kyonggi Province of south Korea Wednesday, the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, under the sponsorship of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration according to south Korean internet paper Tongilnews.
					 The permanent representative of the committee deplored the failure of the opening of the event common to the nation in Kaesong due to the authorities' hostility toward the north.
					
					 The acting chairman of the Confederation of Trade Unions and other speakers said the June 15 joint declaration should be implemented without fail as it reflects the desire of the nation.
					
					 They said they would successfully open the football match between workers of the south and north for reunification in Seoul to contribute to achieving reunification.
					
					 Read out at the meeting was an appeal of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Japanese Institute Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Abduction of DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Japanese Institute Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Abduction of DPRK Citizens
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan on June 7 sent the south Korean embassy in Tokyo a letter protesting against the south Korean puppet forces' allurement and abduction of a group of the DPRK citizens. 
					 The letter of protest revealed that the south Korean puppet group is making desperate efforts to disguise the abduction of the DPRK women citizens as "their voluntary defection from the north" after committing a premeditated terrorism against the DPRK citizens for a vicious purpose.
					
					 The DPRK women citizens are staging a struggle for their repatriation to their country, the letter noted.
					
					 The letter urged the south Korean authorities to accept the request of the parents of the abductees to meet their daughters.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Bulgarian Political Figure
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Bulgarian Political Figure
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, issued a statement on June 9 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 He said:
					
					 June 15 marks a significant day in the history of the Korean people's protracted struggle for reunifying the country divided by foreign forces.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il provided the north-south summit for the first time in the history of the Korean people's division in June, 2000 and made sure that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a landmark for Korea's reunification, was adopted.
					
					 He provided another historic north-south summit in Pyongyang in Oct. 2007 and made sure that the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, was adopted.
					
					 Thanks to the adoption of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the day is to come earlier when the Korean people's dream about the building of a reunified power is to be realized.
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities totally denied the north-south joint declarations and stamped out all the successes registered in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 They drove the north-south relations to a catastrophe with their extreme moves for confrontation.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are only seeking their interests, irrespective of the prosperity of humanity.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Urge U.S. to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Urge U.S. to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 11 in support of the open letter sent by the participants in the joint conference of the Government, Political Parties and Organizations of the DPRK to the U.S.
					 Recalling the major contents of the open letter, the statement continued:
					
					 The U.S. is the main obstacle checking the independent reunification of Korea.
					
					 It should roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and have a fresh and realistic way of thinking about the latter.
					
					 Only then, can Korea's independent reunification be realized and peace on the Korean peninsula be ensured.
					
					 We fully support the above-said letter.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Support Appeal of DPRK Government, Political Parties, Organizations
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Support Appeal of DPRK Government, Political Parties, Organizations
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on June 11 in support of the appeal "Let all Koreans pool the efforts to pull down the wall dividing the nation and open a broad avenue to the national reunification" adopted at the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations.
					 Noting that the DPRK government, political parties and organizations held a joint conference for carrying out the policies for national reunification set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and sent all the Koreans the appeal, the statement said:
					
					 The appeal suggested holding a great national meeting for reunification on the occasion of the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 It also called upon the entire nation to turn out in the nationwide anti-U.S. struggle to drive the U.S. imperialists out of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We fully support this appeal.
					
					 We are sure that the Korean people will achieve the cause of national reunification in the near future under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean Nation Will Certainly Win Victory in Efforts for Reunification: Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Korean Nation Will Certainly Win Victory in Efforts for Reunification: Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article on June 10 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The article enumerated the facts that the north-south summit was provided in June, 2000, 55 years since the country's division, and the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was adopted there and the era of independent reunification was ushered in amid the ardent support and sympathy by not only the Korean nation but also the international community.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 Such world-startling changes made in the north-south relations are the brilliant fruition brought about by the June 15 joint declaration in which both sides committed themselves to achieving the country's reunification and prosperity common to the nation by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 However, the present south Korean authorities took the lead in the international sanctions racket against the DPRK by taking advantage of the policy of the U.S. which pulled up the latter over its measures for bolstering up its self-defensive capabilities and space development for peaceful purposes, and completely cut off cooperation between NGOs.
					
					 Today the Korean nation is waging a nationwide struggle for maintaining the June 15 joint declaration and ushering in an era of peace and reunification.
					
					 The Korean nation will certainly win a victory in their nationwide and patriotic struggle for building a reunified power.

articles.title: Int'l Body Urges S. Korean Authorities to Send DPRK's Women Back Home
articles.content:
Int'l Body Urges S. Korean Authorities to Send DPRK's Women Back Home
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain issued a statement on June 7.
					 The statement accused the south Korean authorities of their group allurement and abduction of citizens of the DPRK.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are painting their group allurement and abduction as "voluntary defection from the north".
					
					 Despite the Park Geun Hye group's talk about the "voluntary defection from the north" the women of the DPRK denied it and are struggling for their return home.
					
					 Families of the victims who were allured and abducted in group filed suits with the UN high commissioner for Human Rights and the president of the UN Human Rights Council against the south Korean authorities' crime.
					
					 Parents of the victims are demanding a meeting with their daughters but the south Korean authorities are disallowing it.
					
					 We strongly urge the south Korean authorities to immediately send the women citizens of the DPRK back home.

articles.title: Nepali Political Party Praises Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Nepali Political Party Praises Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) made public a statement on June 10 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The flag of the WPK fluttered higher when the red flags were lowered in the East European countries late in the 20th century.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's Songun politics and benevolent politics, today Korean style socialism has taken deep roots among the masses and the WPK is enjoying absolute support and trust from them.
					
					 Kim Jong Il wrote scores of works including "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building", "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerance", "Socialism Is a Science" and "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" to clarify the vital issues arising in building a revolutionary party of the working class and the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism.
					
					 We pay homage to him with profound reverence for him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by British Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by British Body
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The full text of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Become Pillars Supporting a Prosperous Future Korea" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on June 9.
					 Kim Jong Un made a congratulatory speech at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations on June 6, Juche 101 (2012) in celebration of the 66th founding anniversary of the KCU. In the speech he expressed his firm will to invariably carry forward the noble outlook of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the future and the rising generation.
					
					 He also indicated the tasks and ways to bring up the KCU members to be knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy reserve forces who are responsible for the future destiny of the country and the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Procesamiento de Maiz de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Procesamiento de Maiz de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito Fabrica de Procesamiento de Maiz de Pyongyang, remodelada magnificamente segun la demanda de la epoca de la economia intelectual y el aspecto de la potencia civilizada socialista.
					El Mariscal recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					Dando vista a los datos alusivos a la trayectoria gloriosa de desarrollo de la fabrica, el Mariscal dijo que bajo la direccion y atencion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la fabrica se convirtio en una base de procesamiento de alimentos de gran envergadura y apunto que no debemos olvidar nunca el noble amor por el pueblo de los grandes Lideres quienes en todas sus vidas prestaban mucha atencion a la mejora de vida del pueblo.
					
					Recordo el dia en que habia visitado la fabrica acompanando al Dirigente y recalco que se han construido bien las salas arriba mencionadas, de modo que se transmitan para siempre los beneficios de los Lideres antecesores quienes se preocupaban tanto por la produccion de meriendas a suministrar a los habitantes.
					
					Si uno recorre solamente la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria de la fabrica, podra conocer bien las hazanas del Presidente y el Dirigente y la politica de industria alimentaria de nuestro partido, asevero y prosiguio que los numerosos datos expuestos alli sirven de la bandera estimulante para promover el desarrollo de la industria alimentaria del nuevo siglo y llamar a los obreros de la fabrica al aumento productivo.
					
					Pasando por varios lugares de la fabrica, el Mariscal averiguo en detalles el estado de modernizacion y la produccion de la fabrica.
					
					Subrayo que todos los procesos de elaboracion de maiz, melaza, azucar de maiz, galletas, caramelos y otros fueron automatizados en cadenas y esterilizados sin polvo en alto nivel, asi como se ha establecido hasta el sistema de control de calidad de productos, lo que permitio ahorrar mucho las manos de obra, elevar considerablemente el rendimiento de produccion y garantizar la seguridad higienica de los productos.
					
					El mayor exito alcanzado en la modernizacion es que la fabrica esta dispuesta de los equipos nacionales en mas de 95%, puntualizo.
					
					Senalo que en todos los procesos, desde la inversion de materias primas hasta el embalaje, estan colocados los equipos ultramodernos disenados y elaborados por nuestra propia cuenta y agrego que sus figuras son unanimemente vistosas. Acoto que la rama de industria alimientaria ha tomado delantera en los ultimos anos en materializar la orientacion del partido de mantener el principio de utilizar los productos nacionales.
					
					Subrayo que la fabrica se ha remodelado magnificamente cuando en todo el pais se levanta una fuerte oleada de modernizacion a estilo coreano basada en el principio mencionado.
					
					Dijo con mucha alegria que la Fabrica de Procesamiento de Maiz de Pyongyang se ha hecho como modelo en enaltecer la bandera de jucheanizacion, presentarse como prototipo en la campana por creacion de autofortalecimiento y ensenar como deben modernizar.
					
					El Mariscal tomo una fotografia de recuerdo junto con los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, An Jong Su, y los subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won y Sin Man Gyun.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza entrada de submarino nuclear de EE.UU. en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza entrada de submarino nuclear de EE.UU. en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- Segun trascendidos, el pasado dia 13 el submarino nuclear norteamericano Mississippi aparecio por primera vez en la region de Asia-Pacifico y entro en el puerto de Pusan del Sur de Corea. 
					Este armamento ultramoderno de ataque de las fuerzas navales norteamericanas, dotado de muchos dispositivos de torpedos y misiles cruceros, se puso en servicio en 2012 y cumple la mision de asegurar el ataque a los buques enemigos y otras operaciones especiales.
					
					En el periodo de los simulacros conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16, librados durante mas de 50 dias a partir de marzo en el suelo surcoreano, EE.UU. movilizo el portaaviones nuclear Stennis, los cazas estrategicos nucleares B-52 y B-2, los aviones de combate Stealth F-22A y otros medios de ataque nuclear estrategico llevando la situacion al borde de la guerra. 
					
					Ahora los dos portaaviones nucleares norteamericanos estan flotando permanentemente en la zona maritima de Asia-Pacifico en las inmediaciones de la Peninsula Coreana y se traza a puertas abiertas en EE.UU. el guion de "operacion de ataque aereo de precision" contra las instalaciones y fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC. La entrada del portaaviones nuclear norteamericano en el Sur de Corea en tal circunstancia significa la amenaza directa a la seguridad de la RPDC y a la paz de la region. 
					
					Senalo asi el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en su declaracion fechada 16 y continuo:
					
					Se hace cada dia mas incontrolable la situacion inestable de la Peninsula Coreana, debido a la introduccion de los armamentos estrategicos de toda indole de EE.UU. en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno. 
					
					El optimo remedio para prevenir la guerra y preservar la paz en la Peninsula Coreana, zona mas candente del mundo que se encuentra permanentemente en la crisis de guerra nuclear por las incesantes maniobras de provocacion de nueva guerra del imperio americano, es consolidar por todos los medios el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC. 
					
					La linea del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares es la mas justa para eliminar de raiz el peligro de guerra nuclear causado por EE.UU. y preservar la paz y la seguridad de la region y el resto del mundo mediante el fuerte disuasivo nuclear. 
					
					EE.UU. recurre incesantemente al chantaje nuclear y a los ejercicios de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC persistiendo en que es primordial la desnuclearizacion, lo cual es una sofisteria cinica. 
					
					EE.UU. debe abandonar la anacronica politica de hostilidad a la RPDC y tomar la decision politica de retirar sus uniformados y pertrechos de guerra estacionados en el suelo surcoreano teniendo en consideracion la posicion estrategica de la RPDC como avanzada potencia nuclear y la corriente de la epoca.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con miembros principales de ITF
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con miembros principales de ITF
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio hoy en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el presidente Ri Yong Son, el vicepresidente Leong Wai Meng y otros miembros principales de la Federacion Internacional de Taekwondo (ITF en ingles), quienes le hicieron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Efectuada comision ejecutiva de CIJAM
articles.content:
Efectuada comision ejecutiva de CIJAM
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en esta capital la comision ejecutiva del Comite Internacional de Juegos de Artes Marciales.
					Tomaron parte alli Ri Yong Son, presidente del CIJAM y de la Federacion Internacional de Taekwondo (ITF en ingles), Leong Wai Meng, vicepresidente del CIJAM y de la ITF, y otros miembros ejecutivos.
					
					Participaron en calidad de observador los delegados de la Federacion Internacional de Artes Marciales y de Comites de Juegos de Artes Marciales Nacionales.
					
					Se abordaron en la ocasion los temas de realizar el ideal de la organizacion al desarrollar mas la labor del comite, y seleccionar pais patrocinador de la VII Competencia Internacional de Artes Marciales, y etc.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC a acreditarse en Sudafrica
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC a acreditarse en Sudafrica
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- Segun un decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Chang Ryop fue nombrado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC a acreditarse en la Republica de Sudafrica.

articles.title: Portavoz de comite norteno de 15 de Junio denuncia crimen de banda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Portavoz de comite norteno de 15 de Junio denuncia crimen de banda de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 16o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, todos los coreanos se levantan activamente en el movimiento patriotico para abrir nueva coyuntura favorable a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y al movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria uniendo las fuerzas entre los coreanos.
					Pero, la banda de Park Geun-hye del Sur de Corea cometio sin alguna vacilacion la locura anti-reunificacion de impedir el acto conjunto nacional del 15 de Junio de este ano que se ha promovido bajo la gran esperanza y atencion de todos los coreanos.
					
					La horda de Park, disgustada de la reunion de los presidentes del Norte, el Sur y el Ultramar del Comite Conjunto Nacional (CCN) por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, no permitio la participacion de los representantes del comite sureno del 15 de Junio en dicha reunion e les impuso hasta la multa cuestionando absurdamente sus actos justos de haber participado con la decision audaz en esa cita.
					
					Ademas, no permitio hasta la peticion de la delegacion del comite sureno del 15 de Junio de visitar al Norte de Corea para participar en el acto conjunto nacional del 15 de Junio que se realiza en Kaesong.
					
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio publico el dia 16 una declaracion condenando tales maniobras de la banda de Park Geun-hye como desafio atroz a la aspiracion y el deseo de todos los coreanos que esperan la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, la paz y la reunificacion y como crimen antinacional y anti-reunificacion.
					
					En las maquinaciones arriba mencionadas de la horda de Park esta ocultado el objetivo vil de racionalizar la situacion pobre de ella misma atemorizada por la voluntad de reunificacion de la nacion y manchada por sus actos serviles a los Estados Unidos y la confrontacion fratricida, revela el documento y prosigue:
					
					La realidad vuelve a demostrar claramente que la banda de Park Geun-hye es precisamente el autor que se opone a la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion, la paz y la reunificacion y lleva a la catastrofe las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					Los compinches de Park no pueden evadirse nunca de la responsabilidad de haber llevado las relaciones N-S a la peor catastrofe, ni deben actuar con imprudencia teniendo presente de que si sigan haciendo la locura conflictiva como ahora, aceleraran el destino de ruina y no evitaran la sentencia severa de la nacion.
